description:
The guildmaster’s latest scheme involves a political marriage between Peter and an ugly orc. Peter thinks he’s safe from temptation, but beauty is in the eye of the beholder.
Source: HIDIVE

titles.title: Peter Grill and a Blind Date with an Orc
Peter Grill et la proposition de manga de l`orque
Peter Grill to Orc no Endan
بيتر جريل والموعد الأعمى مع فتاة الأورك
ピーター・グリルとオークの縁談
